Grieve.origin: [wage claims…had been contractually grieved "M. A. Kelly"]

griev·ing.definition: to submit (a grievance) to a grievance procedure [wage claims…had been contractually"M. A. Kelly"]to bring a grievance under a grievance procedure [as a union member, Jackson was obligated to — not sue ", 863 F.2d 111 (1988)"]
